sn21.12:1.2: Atha kho dve bhikkhu sahayaka ayasmato mahakappinassa saddhiviharino yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu.
sn21.12:1.3: Addasa kho bhagava te bhikkhu duratova agacchante.
sn21.12:1.5: “passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, ete bhikkhu sahayake agacchante kappinassa saddhiviharino”ti?
sn21.12:1.8: Na ca sa samapatti sulabharupa, ya tehi bhikkhuhi asamapannapubba.
sn21.12:1.9: Yassa catthaya kulaputta sammadeva agarasma anagariyam pabbajanti tadanuttaram brahmacariyapariyosanam dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharanti”ti.
sn21.12:2.2: Idam vatvana sugato athaparam etadavoca sattha:
